name: Secluded (careywhite98)
description:
Secluded - Craft, build, destroy and survive!

You wanted to get away from the rush of everyday life. You wanted to spend more time with nature, with your four legged friend. You journeyed off to the vast unknowns. Will you thrive in your new, secluded life, or will you succumb to your surroundings and become a part of the islands landscape?

Level up and upgrade your trusty pickaxe! Every 5 levels you achieve, you will be rewarded with a brand new pickaxe, which is stronger than the last!

Please note that this is an early access game, hence the "Early Access / Alpha Tester". 

The reason I am realising this as early access is, not because of money, but because I want honest feedback and ideas. I plan to, hopefully, reply to all comments, questions, bug reports and feature requests! 

If you have any questions, feedback, bug reports or to hang out, feel free to join the dedicated Secluded Discord - https://discord.gg/CXKd7fQ
